name: DeJa Fu
description:
Infiltrate an enemy base as a time-travelling swordsman.

(Use full-screen for best experience)

Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2.
Theme: Rewind

Controls:

WAD, or arrow keys, and space for movement.

Left-click to attack. 

Right-click to activate DeJa Fu. The longer it is held, the farther you teleport into the past.
